author: Staff Reporter
text:
A building contractor, T. Alexander (45), hailing from a village near Kulasekaram, was arrested by Marthandam All Women Police on Wednesday on a charge of sexually harassing his daughter who is studying Class X in a private school.

The incident came to light when the girl informed one of her close friends of the sexual harassment by her own father.

Later, the Childline was informed.

Girl leaves house

Unable to bear the sexual harassment by her father, the girl went to her maternal grandparent’s house, and refused to go with her parents.

Childline goes to police

The Childline took up the issue with All Women’s Police Station in Marthandam. The police rushed to the girl’s housee, and brought her and Alexander to the station.

After a thorough inquiry, they arrested Alexander under Sections 7, 8 and 9 of the Protection of Children from Sexual Offences Act, 2012.

He was produced before a local court, which remanded him in judicial custody.

He had earlier been arrested in a sexual abuse case.
title: Man held for sexually harassing daughter
